divs: Sighting DetailsI was in SE Michigan, about 15 miles north of Toledo, OH when my husband and I saw the bright light in the sky that vanished. He is a complete skeptic, but did concur that it was definitely not an airplane, helicopter, or satellite. I am amazed at the sightings of this same phenomenon, from Washington to New Jersey. I wish I could have filmed it, but didn't have time to grab my camera.
Summary: Response to Charlevoix, MI bright light in sky
